author: Ainy Cormac
description:
Glen Cook’s The White Rose is a dark, gritty and strange novel that brings to a close the first trilogy in The Chronicles of the Black Company. Full of sharp dialogue and absurd worldbuilding, The White Rose is a grimdark novel that verges on the Weird, leaning into the bizarre and hallucinatory aspects of dark […]

The post REVIEW: The White Rose by Glen Cook appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The White Rose by Glen Cook
